Package com.intellij.util.xml

Interface CustomReferenceConverter<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AntDomAnt.AntFilePathConverter, AntDomDefaultTargetConverter, AntDomRefIdConverter, AntDomTargetDependsListConverter, AntMultiPathStringConverter, AntPathConverter, AntPathRelativeToAntFileConverter, AntPathValidatingConverter, CanonicalPsiTypeConverterImpl, ClassArrayConverter, ClassArrayConverterImpl, ClassValueConverter, ClassValueConverterImpl, DelimitedListConverter, JvmPsiTypeConverterImpl, PathReferenceConverter, PsiClassConverter, PsiClassConverter.AnnotationType, PsiClassConverter.EnumType, PsiPackageConverter, QuotedValueConverter, RngHrefConverter, RngReferenceConverter

    public interface CustomReferenceConverter<T>
    Can be implemented by Converter instance, or used with Referencing annotation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PsiReference [] createReferences(GenericDomValue<T> value, PsiElement element, ConvertContext context)
      Will be called on creating PsiReferences for GenericDomValue Returned PsiReferences should be soft (PsiReference.isSoft() should return true).

    • Method Detail

      • createReferences

        PsiReference [] createReferences(GenericDomValue<T> value,
                                 PsiElement element,
                                 ConvertContext context)
        Will be called on creating PsiReferences for GenericDomValue Returned PsiReferences should be soft (PsiReference.isSoft() should return true). To highlight unresolved references, create a DomElementsInspection and register it.
        Parameters:
        value - GenericDomValue in question
        element - corresponding PSI element
        context - ConvertContext
        Returns:
        custom PsiReferences for the value
